name: Full Materials ver3.0
summary: Full Materials 2.0 is a music album by Mohican Sandbag released on 2008-04-20 (Sunshine Creation 39).

• 厂牌: モヒカンサンドバッグ
  • 发售日期: 2008/04/20 (Sunshine Creation 39)
  • 价格: 1050円 (税込)

  • 碟片数量: 1
